alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Miami; Pulaski; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:20AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern White, southeastern Pulaski, southern Fulton, Cass and western Miami Counties through 600 AM EDT... At 520 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Winamac to near Delphi. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Logansport, Peru, Rochester, Grissom Afb, Akron, Walton, Bunker Hill, Royal Center, Mexico, Lincoln, Wells, Galveston, Miami, Kewanna, Denver, Burnettsville, Fulton, Macy, Onward and Clymers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
